title: WEHI-SODA-Hub/spatialmibi pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

an_expression_file.errorMessage: Expression file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.csv' or '.csv.gz'

an_hierarchy_file.errorMessage: Hierarchy file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.yml' or '.yaml'

an_markers.errorMessage: Markers must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces

an_cell_types.errorMessage: Cell types must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces

an_parent_types.errorMessage: Parent types must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces

an_analyses.errorMessage: Downstream analyses must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces

seg_mibi_tiff.errorMessage: MIBI TIFF file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tiff'

seg_nuclear_channel.errorMessage: Nuclear channel must be provided as a single word without spaces

seg_membrane_channels.errorMessage: Membrane channels must be provided as a semicolon-separated list without spaces

seg_combine_method.errorMessage: Combine method must be either 'prod' or 'max'

seg_level.errorMessage: Segmentation level must be an integer between 0 and 10

seg_interior_threshold.errorMessage: Interior threshold must be a number between 0 and 1

seg_maxima_smooth.errorMessage: Maxima smoothing must be a number greater than or equal to 0

seg_min_nuclei_area.errorMessage: Minimum nuclei area must be a number greater than or equal to 0

seg_remove_border_cells.errorMessage: Remove border cells must be a boolean

seg_include_measurements.errorMessage: Include measurements must be a boolean

seg_pixel_expansion.errorMessage: Pixel expansion must be an integer greater than or equal to 0

seg_padding.errorMessage: Padding must be an integer greater than or equal to 0
